participant_1.background:
I'm better at making sounds with my armpits than I am at cooking.
I think it's really cool that I can use my skills to help people in need.
i hate broccoli.
i am gluten free.
I write poems about my life and my culture.

participant_2.background:
I sometimes neglect to give my dog enough attention.
I am a student who is trying to stay positive and focus on my studies.
i love to paint pictures.
i have always had long hair.
i love to cut down trees.

content.text: Good! I am a student trying to stay positive and focus on my studies.
That's great! I am a writer and I am trying to write a book about a woman who is trying to find her way in the world.
Oh, that sounds really cool! What made you want to write a book about that?
I think it's a really important topic to talk about and I want to share my story with others who may be going through something similar.
That's wonderful! I'm sure it will be a great book.
Thank you! I'm hoping so too.
What do you like to do for fun?
I love to write poems, paint pictures, and go hiking.
Oh, that's really cool! I love to paint pictures too!
Oh, that's great! What kind of things do you like to paint?
I like to paint landscapes and abstracts.
Oh, that sounds really cool! I've always wanted to try painting abstracts.
I might just have to give it a try!
I'm sure you'd be great at it!
Thank you! That's really nice of you to say.
